pages.text: Created using an $(blood)Alchemy Array$() by combining a $(l:animus:items/reagentbuilder)Reagent: Builder$() with a $(item)Reinforced Slate$(). The reagent must first be forged in the Hellfire Forge.
Accelerate your construction projects. The Sigil of the Fast Builder dramatically increases block placement speed, allowing you to build structures at supernatural speeds.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() Minimal per block placed$(br2)$(bold)Effect:$() Hold the sigil while building to place blocks much faster than normal.$(br2)The sigil works passively; simply have it in your inventory or hotbar while placing blocks to benefit from accelerated building speed.$(br2)Perfect for large construction projects, terraforming, and creative building.
